name: Twilight Tapas
description: Evening sharing plates inspired by Mediterranean coastlines and late-night markets.

categories.name: Small plates
categories.description: Vibrant vegetables, crudos and sharing bites.

dishes.name: Heirloom tomato escalivada
dishes.description: Coal-roasted tomatoes with smoked olive oil and almond romesco.

dishes.name: Sea bass crudo
dishes.description: Citrus-cured sea bass, fennel pollen and green grape aguachile.

dishes.name: Charred broccoli with harissa labneh
dishes.description: Warm broccoli, harissa labneh, smoked almonds and preserved lemon.

categories.name: Josper skewers
categories.description: Skewers grilled over almond wood with house marinades.

dishes.name: Lamb kofte with pomegranate glaze
dishes.description: Spiced lamb, pomegranate molasses and mint yoghurt.

dishes.name: Galician octopus
dishes.description: Slow-cooked octopus finished on the grill with smoked paprika butter.

categories.name: Desserts
categories.description: Late night sweets with regional accents.

dishes.name: Citrus olive oil cake
dishes.description: Warm olive oil sponge, yoghurt espuma and bergamot marmalade.

dishes.name: Sea salt chocolate ganache
dishes.description: Dark chocolate ganache, smoked salt and candied orange.
